RelatedSentence: The shelters and animal welfare agencies provide their local prison facilities with dogs at risk of going unadopted due to their disposition or behavior .
The inmate trainers work with dogs for 6 to 8 weeks to teach them basic behavior and socialization .

The inmates learn their dog training techniques under the guidance of professional dog trainers who volunteer their services to teach the inmates .
